cards.name: Energy Sword
cards.description:
Ethereal.
Target lose all Block.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Energy Sword+
cards.description:
Ethereal.
Target lose all Block and gain 2 Vulnerable .
Exhaust.

cards.name: Firewall
cards.description:
Ethereal.
Gain 1 Artifact.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Firewall+
cards.description:
Ethereal.
Gain 2 Artifact.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Injection
cards.description:
Ethereal.
Target lose all Strength.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Injection+
cards.description:
Ethereal.
Target lose all Strength and gain 2 Weak .
Exhaust.

cards.name: Purified Water
cards.description:
Ethereal.
Exhaust 2 cards from the bottom of your draw pile and discard pile.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Purified Water+
cards.description:
Ethereal.
Exhaust 2 cards from the bottom of your draw pile and discard pile, and put non-curse or status cards into your hand after 2 turn starts.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Defend
cards.description: Gain 5 Block.

cards.name: Defend+
cards.description: Gain 8 Block.

cards.name: Strike
cards.description: Deal 6 damage.

cards.name: Strike+
cards.description: Deal 9 damage.

cards.name: Bounty
cards.description:
Draw 1 cards.
If target non-minion enemy died during its next 4th turn, you get 10 gold.

cards.name: Bounty+
cards.description:
Draw 2 cards.
If target non-minion enemy died during its next 4th or 6th turn, you get 15 gold.

cards.name: Brainstorm
cards.description: Deal 12 damage to all enemies after 2 turn starts.

cards.name: Brainstorm+
cards.description: Deal 18 damage to all enemies after 2 turn starts.

cards.name: Charge
cards.description: Gain 3 energy after 2 turns.

cards.name: Charge+
cards.description: Gain 3 energy after 2 and 4 turns.

cards.name: Counter Strike
cards.description:
Gain 7 Block.
Target takes 7 damage after 2 turn starts.

cards.name: Counter Strike+
cards.description:
Gain 12 Block.
Target takes 12 damage after 2 turn starts.

cards.name: Delay
cards.description: Before the turn end of your next turn, the HP loss will be delayed to your next 2 turn ends as damage. Half of the delayed damage cannot be delayed again.

cards.name: Delay+
cards.description: Before the turn end of your next turn, the HP loss will be delayed to your next 2 turn ends as damage. Half of the delayed damage cannot be delayed again.

cards.name: Future Defend
cards.description: Gain 14 Block after 2 turn starts.

cards.name: Future Defend+
cards.description: Gain 21 Block after 2 turn starts.

cards.name: Future Strike
cards.description: Target takes 16 damage after 3 turn starts.

cards.name: Future Strike+
cards.description: Target takes 24 damage after 3 turn starts.

cards.name: Meteor
cards.description: Target takes 36 damage after 4 turn starts.

cards.name: Meteor+
cards.description: Target takes 48 damage after 4 turn starts.

cards.name: Overdraft
cards.description: Gain 14 Block, draw 2 Cards. After 2 turn starts, take 14 damage.

cards.name: Overdraft+
cards.description:
Innate
Gain 14 Block, draw 2 cards. After 2 turn starts, take 14 damage.

cards.name: Push Time
cards.description: Target lose 1 stack of prediction.

cards.name: Push Time+
cards.description: All enemies lose 1 stack of prediction.

cards.name: Solid Time
cards.description: Every character get 1 stack of prediction. For each character affected, you get 6 Block.

cards.name: Solid Time+
cards.description: Every character get 1 stack of prediction. For each character affected, you get 9 Block.

cards.name: Time Contraction
cards.description: Lose 1 stack of prediction.

cards.name: Time Contraction+
cards.description: Lose 1 stack of prediction.

cards.name: Toolbox
cards.description: Put a Tool into your hand after 2 turn starts.

cards.name: Toolbox+
cards.description: Put an upgraded Tool into your hand after 2 turn starts.

cards.name: Accurate Prediction
cards.description:
Exhaust 1 card from your hand, draw pile and discard pile respectively and put them into your hand after 2 turn starts.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Accurate Prediction+
cards.description: Exhaust 1 card from your hand, draw pile and discard pile respectively and put them into your hand after 2 turn starts.

cards.name: Death Mark
cards.description: Target enemy takes 4 damage in its 4th turn. Multiply damage it takes by 2 in that turn.

cards.name: Death Mark+
cards.description: Target enemy takes 5 damage in its 4th and 6th turn. Multiply damage it takes by 2 in those turns.

cards.name: Doom
cards.description: Deal 40 damage to all enemies after 4 turn starts. You will also take 20 damage after that turn ends.

cards.name: Doom+
cards.description: Deal 60 damage to all enemies after 4 turn starts. You will also take 20 damage after that turn ends.

cards.name: Explosive Armor
cards.description: From your 3rd turn ends, when you lose Block by damage, an enemy take the same amount of damage after its 2 turn starts. Last for a turn. You gain 7 Block after 2 turn starts.

cards.name: Explosive Armor+
cards.description: From your 3rd turn ends, when you lose Block by damage, an enemy take the same amount of damage after its 2 turn starts. Last for a turn. You gain 14 Block after 2 turn starts.

cards.name: Halflife Period
cards.description: After 3 turn starts of the target, if its health is less than half, it takes 18 damage, otherwise you gain 18 Block.

cards.name: Halflife Period+
cards.description: After 3 turn starts of the target, if its health is less than half, it takes 27 damage, otherwise you gain 27 Block.

cards.name: Hat Trick
cards.description:
Draw a card.
Put a card in your hand into your draw pile.

cards.name: Hat Trick+
cards.description: Draw 2 cards. Put a card in your hand into your draw pile.

cards.name: Hunt
cards.description:
Draw 1 cards.
If target non-minion enemy died during its next 5th turn, you get 8 max health.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Hunt+
cards.description:
Draw 2 cards.
If target non-minion enemy died during its next 5th or 7th turn, you get 12 max health.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Infinite Pain
cards.description: Target enemy takes 4 damage in its 3th turn. The damage it takes in that turn will be taken again after 2 turns.

cards.name: Infinite Pain+
cards.description: Target enemy takes 5 damage in its 3th and 5th turn. The damage it takes in those turns will be taken again after 2 turns.

cards.name: Lie
cards.description: Remove your negative prediction.

cards.name: Lie
cards.description: Remove your negative prediction.

cards.name: Lie
cards.description: Remove your negative prediction.

cards.name: Probing Attack
cards.description: Target enemy takes 4 damage in its 2nd turn. The damage it takes in that turn will give the damage dealer the same amount of Block.

cards.name: Probing Attack+
cards.description: Target enemy takes 5 damage in its 2nd and 4th turn. The damage it takes in those turns will give the damage dealer the same amount of Block.

cards.name: Quick Beam
cards.description: Draw a card. Target enemy lost 1 stack of prediction, take 6 damage, and gain 1 Weak.

cards.name: Quick Beam+
cards.description: Draw 2 cards. Target enemy lost 1 stack of prediction, take 9 damage, and gain 2 Weak.

cards.name: Retry
cards.description:
Draw as many card as possible, then discard the same number of cards. You take 6 damage after 2 turn starts.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Retry+
cards.description:
Draw as many card as possible, then discard the same number of cards.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Taste Blood
cards.description:
Target enemy takes 2 damage in its 5th turn. The damage it takes in that turn will heal the damage dealer for the same amount.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Taste Blood+
cards.description:
Target enemy takes 3 damage in its 5th and 7th turn. The damage it takes in those turns will heal the damage dealer for the same amount.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Thrifty
cards.description: If you have no card left in your hand at end of turn, you draw 2 cards cards in next turn.

cards.name: Thrifty+
cards.description:
Innate
If you have no card left in your hand at end of turn, you draw 2 cards cards in next turn.

cards.name: Time Bomb
cards.description: Deal 25 damage to all enemies after 3 turn starts.

cards.name: Time Bomb+
cards.description: Deal 35 damage to all enemies after 3 turn starts.

cards.name: Time Capsule
cards.description: Draw 1 card. Exhaust a card in your hand and move it into your hand after 2 turn starts.

cards.name: Time Capsule+
cards.description: Draw 2 card. Exhaust a card in your hand and move it into your hand after 2 turn starts.

cards.name: 4D Print
cards.description: At every turn end, put a Tool into your hand after 2 turn starts.

cards.name: 4D Print+
cards.description: At every turn end, put an upgraded Tool into your hand after 2 turn starts.

cards.name: Absolute Defense
cards.description:
Preventing you from taking damage for your next 3rd turn.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Absolute Defense+
cards.description:
Preventing you from taking damage for your next 3rd and 5th turn.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Borrow
cards.description:
Deal 10 damage and gain 10 health.
Return 10 health to target at its next 3 turn ends.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Borrow+
cards.description:
Deal 15 damage and gain 15 health.
Return 15 health to target at its next 4 turn ends.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Confident Turn
cards.description:
At end of battle, you are healed by 9 and gain 9 gold for every turn after using this card.
Lose this effect when you use a card.

cards.name: Confident Turn+
cards.description:
At end of battle, you are healed by 15 and gain 15 gold for every turn after using this card.
Lose this effect when you use a card.

cards.name: Double Trouble
cards.description: Your next card played in this turn will be played after 2 turn starts.

cards.name: Double Trouble+
cards.description: Your next 2 cards played in this turn will be played after 2 turn starts.

cards.name: Meet Future
cards.description:
Ethereal.
Every card played is played another time in your next 2 turn.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Meet Future+
cards.description:
NL Every card played is played another time in your next 2 turn.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Overhead
cards.description: When your hand is empty, draw a card and it costs 0 for this turn. When you play it, add a Dazed into your draw pile.

cards.name: Overhead+
cards.description:
Innate.
When your hand has less than 2 cards, draw a card and it costs 0 for this turn. When you play it, add a Dazed into your draw pile.

cards.name: Predestined
cards.description:
Innate, Ethereal.
Exhaust 3 cards from you draw pile, and put them into your hand in current, next and next 2 turn.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Predestined+
cards.description:
Innate, Ethereal.
Exhaust 4 cards from you draw pile, and put them into your hand in current, next, next 2 and next 3 turn.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Reinforce
cards.description: Whenever you gain Block, you gain same amount of Block after 4 turn starts.

cards.name: Reinforce+
cards.description: Whenever you gain Block, you gain same amount of Block after 3 turn starts.

relics.name: Future Seer
relics.description: When battle ends, you gain 4 gold and HP for every turn in a battle. The bonus is cleared when you use a card.
relics.flavorText: Do not waste your life and money to doomed enemies.
